DataElement.preferredName: Access Biopsy Receptor Gene Expression Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for eligibility on accessing biopsy for receptor expression testing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Access Biopsy Receptor Gene Expression Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._A protein located on the cell surface, or in the cytoplasm, that binds to a specific signaling factor, such as a hormone, antigen, or neurotransmitter, causing a conformational and functional change in the receptor molecule.  The ligand-bound receptor then alters its interaction with target molecules, which leads to changes in cellular physiology through modification of the activity of one or more signal transduction pathways._Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.:A protein located on the cell surface, or in the cytoplasm, that binds to a specific signaling factor, such as a hormone, antigen, or neurotransmitter, causing a conformational and functional change in the receptor molecule.  The ligand-bound receptor then alters its interaction with target molecules, which leads to changes in cellular physiology through modification of the activity of one or more signal transduction pathways.:Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

Concepts.definition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

A protein located on the cell surface, or in the cytoplasm, that binds to a specific signaling factor, such as a hormone, antigen, or neurotransmitter, causing a conformational and functional change in the receptor molecule.  The ligand-bound receptor then alters its interaction with target molecules, which leads to changes in cellular physiology through modification of the activity of one or more signal transduction pathways.
Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

Property.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/15/2020, created for DCP SVAR MDA20-20-01#R2SVAR11272020, wz.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree to allow researchers
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to allow researchers to have access to my biopsy to test ER/PgR expression.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I wish to determine whether I am eligible for the TEAM trial. I have undergone a breast tissue biopsy diagnosis of my current breast nodule and I agree to allow researchers to have access to my biopsy to test ER/PgR expression.

DataElement.changeDescription: 12/15/2020, created for DCP SVAR MDA20-20-01#R2SVAR11272020, wz.
